```{r}
pacman:::p_load(haven, SmartEDA, tidyverse,
                tidymodels, ggridges)

```

```{r}
exam_data <- read_csv("data/Exam_data.csv")
```

```{r}
ggplot(exam_data,
       aes(x = ENGLISH,
           y = CLASS)) +
  geom_boxplot() +
  labs(title = "Boxplot showing distribution") 
```

```{r}
ggplot(exam_data,
       aes(x = ENGLISH,
           y = CLASS)) +
  geom_density_ridges(
    scale = 3,
    rel_min_height = 0.01,
    bandwidth = 2.5,
  ) +
  scale_x_continuous(
    name = "English grades",
    expand = c(0,0),
  ) +
  scale_y_discrete(name = "Class", expand = expansion(add=c(0.2, 2.6))) +
  theme_ridges()
```
